quest.name: A Life More Ordinary
journal: Meffrid is hard at work trying to win over the villagers of Ala Gannha.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, Forename. I've been trying to help the villagers deal with this food shortage of theirs.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Recently, the imperials have been swooping into villages unannounced and seizing supplies in order to prevent the people from stockpiling, in case they might be in league with the Resistance.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: It's not much, but I've taught them a few tricks to better hide what little they've got left. How's Lyse getting on, by the way? You'd think people would be more inclined to trust a local girl─assuming they remember her, that is...

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Why don't you go and see how Lyse is getting on? I'll join you in a few.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: N-No, I didn't mean to...

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: ...And where were you these past twenty years!? Where were you when we were being ground under the Black Wolf's boot!? On the other side of his bastard wall, living the high life, I'll wager!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: That's not fair!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: Ho, and who's this, another one of your freedom-loving friends, deigning to help us poor unfortunate souls?

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: Trying to whip us into a frenzy so we'll go and storm a castrum with our pickaxes and shovels!? Leave, all of you, before you bring a cohort down on us all!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: And you─don't you dare speak like you're one of us. You can't even begin to understand what we've been through. You weren't here, Lyse! You weren't here!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: This is my home, and I love it with all my heart. And if you truly have any love for it too, you'll keep us out of your doomed rebellion.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: ...He has a point. No matter what I say or do, it doesn't change the fact I left them behind.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: But this isn't about me, or anyone else. It's about Ala Mhigo. Let's go and find Meffrid.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I knew it wouldn't be easy, but...

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: Looks like the elder wasn't the only one unwilling to hear us out. Can't blame them, given what happened at the Wall.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I thought I might be able to appeal to them as a fellow...I don't know. But, if anything, it just made them angrier. I haven't lived through it like they have.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: I can't claim to know the struggle like they do either, Lyse. I ran too, aye, but if I hadn't, I'd've never met Forename or the rest of you, and we might not be here today, in a position to make a difference.

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: So I don't regret my choices, nor will I apologize for them. There's more than one way to fight.

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: Help! Someone, anyone─we need help!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: I don't like the sound of that one bit. Come on.

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: Wercrata, he...<pant> <pant>...the tributum and...and the bloody ratmen, they... <pant> <pant> Damn it all!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: You there─take a deep breath, and then tell us what happened.

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: It was all business as usual... The tributum's due soon, and we were taking it to the imperials when the Qiqirn attacked! They took my brother, and our money!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Took him where?

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: Ruins to the south of here. Was just an old temple before they came and... Listen, Wercrata's the only family I've got left! If I lose him, I─

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: The Ziggurat? If the ratmen took him there, he's as good as dead...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We've got to get after them! If there's even a chance her brother is still alive, we have to try!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We can save him if we hurry! Come on!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: (You shouldn't get her hopes up like that. Everyone knows the ratmen eat their prisoners.)

dialogue.name: SHARPEYEDWOMEN
dialogue.text: If this sodding leg of mine was any good, I'd...

dialogue.name: BEWILDEREDWOMEN
dialogue.text: You've got to hurry! The gods only know what they could be doing to him!

dialogue.name: MEFFRID
dialogue.text: You're right, Lyse. We've got to help them, if not for the missing man then for the tributum. The Garleans won't suffer excuses if they're late...
